TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: オブジェクトのコレクションを表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects. Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls.
|Technique|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Pull model|The designer for the component class, which is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, supplies this collection through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property. The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |Push model|A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is supplied as a parameter in a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> associated with the component.|
The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>. The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel.
Because it derives from the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase?displayProperty=fullName> class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> uses an internal <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> to store its collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).
[!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent\#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent\#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#8)]
[!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent\#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent\#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## 解説 場合、 [CopyTo メソッド \(DesignerActionList\<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection.CopyTo%2A> メソッドのコピー中に例外をスロー、コピー先の配列の状態は未定義です。 たとえば場合、 [CopyTo メソッド \(DesignerActionList\<xref:System.ArgumentException> または [CopyTo メソッド \(DesignerActionList\<xref:System.InvalidCastException> 発生すると、コピー先の配列は、部分的に入力された状態で残ることがあります。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed

Docs.param: value を挿入する位置の、0 から始まるインデックス。
、コレクションに挿入します。
Docs.summary: 指定された挿入 、コレクション内の指定した位置にします。

remarks.format:
## 解説 場合、 `index` パラメーターがの値に等しい、 <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> プロパティには、新しい要素がコレクションの末尾に追加します。
内部的には、 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> クラスは、 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> のコレクションを格納する <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> オブジェクトです。 リストは、連続する要素を保持するための後続の挿入ポイントが下に新しい要素を合わせて移動します。 この再調整は、カーソル位置の後、その要素のインデックスを変更します。

Docs.exception: 0 より小さいか、現在のコレクション内の要素の数以上の値です。
